arts.sum: The Big Two both suffered league defeats at the weekend and now Rangers switch their attention to Europe

arts.sum: The Basque side make the trip to Glasgow for the first leg of the last eight clash on Thursday

arts.ttl: Arsenal ROCKED as Nico Williams talks COLLAPSE
arts.sum: Arsenal and Barcelona were in a two-way tussle to sign Williams last summer but the player eventually stayed at Athletic Bilbao. Arsenal have ended all talks with Nico Williams over a summer transfer.

arts.ttl: Carlos Cuellar tells Rangers 'I'll do ANYTHING to be in Bilbao' as legend opens up on Seville 'heartbreak'
arts.sum: Cuellar was in Seville in 2022 and now he's targeting a Bilbao final in 2025

arts.ttl: Arsenal-linked Nico Williams 'set to hold' contract talks amid transfer interest
arts.sum: Athletic Bilbao are reportedly set to hold contract talks with Nico Williams amid speculation linking him with a summer move to Arsenal.

arts.ttl: Arsenal target Nico Williams lined up for contract talks after Andrea Berta meeting
arts.sum: Arsenal, Barcelona and Bayern Munich are all in the hunt for Athletic Club winger Nico Williams this summer but there are still no guarantees he will leave his boyhood club due to the complicated finances involved in a potential deal

arts.ttl: Official: Athletic club star signs contract
arts.sum: A member of the defensive ranks at La Liga outfit Athletic Club has this week been rewarded for his form, by way of a contract extension. The player in question?…
